article.Heading: Budget 2017: Fiscal deviation needed to push development, says Finance Secy
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18â€™s Sapna Das spoke to Secretary of Finance, Ashok Lavasa wherein he gave the reason for the deviation in the fiscal number to 3.2%.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18’s Sapna Das spoke to Secretary of Finance, Ashok Lavasa wherein he gave the reason for the deviation in the fiscal number to 3.2%.

Watch accompanying video for more details.
